title: Tell me about a memorable experience you had at a hospital.

korean: 몇 년 전에 응급실 간 적이 있는데, 정말 기억에 남아.
밤늦게 갑자기 배가 너무 아파서 참을 수가 없었어.
혼자 있었는데, 친구한테 전화해서 병원 데려다 달라고 했어.
친구가 택시 불러서 같이 응급실로 갔어.
도착해서 접수하고 기다리는데 사람이 엄청 많았어.
한 시간 넘게 기다렸는데, 계속 아파서 힘들었어.
드디어 진료실 들어갔는데, 의사가 맹장염 의심된다고 했어.
바로 초음파 검사 받고, 다행히 맹장염은 아니었어.
장염이라고 해서 링거 맞고 약 처방받았어.
링거 맞는데 몇 시간 걸렸는데, 그 사이 친구가 계속 옆에 있어줬어.
정말 고마웠고, 건강의 소중함을 다시 느꼈어.
그 이후로는 건강 관리를 더 신경 쓰게 됐어.
english: A few years ago, I went to the emergency room, and it's really memorable.
Late at night, my stomach suddenly hurt so much I couldn't stand it.
I was alone, so I called a friend and asked them to take me to the hospital.
My friend called a taxi and we went to the emergency room together.
After arriving and registering, there were tons of people waiting.
I waited over an hour, and it was hard because I kept hurting.
I finally entered the examination room, and the doctor said it might be appendicitis.
I immediately got an ultrasound, and fortunately it wasn't appendicitis.
They said it was enteritis, so I got an IV and a prescription.
The IV took a few hours, and during that time my friend stayed by my side.
I was really grateful and felt the preciousness of health again.
Since then, I've been paying more attention to health management.
